Title: Dead Code in CLI Error Handler
Description: error() function calls process.exit(1), making subsequent lines unreachable
Impact: Code quality issue, misleading for maintainers
Root Cause: error() helper exits process but additional code placed after
Fix: Replaced error() with print() to allow showHelp() execution

Title: Multiline Parsing - Trailing Whitespace Bug
Description: Parser removes wrong character when closing quote has trailing whitespace
Impact: Data corruption - values include unintended characters
Root Cause: Parser checked trim().endsWith('"') but operated on untrimmed line
Fix: Trim line before removing closing quote

Title: Unclosed Quote Consumes Entire File
Description: Unclosed multiline quotes silently consume all remaining lines
Impact: Silent data loss - environment variables not loaded
Root Cause: No detection when EOF reached without closing quote
Fix: Added warning message for unclosed quotes at EOF

Title: CLI Argument Parsing Accepts Flags as Values
Description: CLI accepts flags as option values without validation
Root Cause: No validation that args[++i] exists or isn't a flag
Fix: Added array bounds and flag detection checks
